entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 03:00 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -10.0°C
Wind: N 39 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to rain at times heavy in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy except snow at times heavy inland and over higher terrain. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm except snowfall amount 15 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 04 March 2023
